about_the_game:
This content adds a new hairstyle for your character in Monster Hunter World: Iceborne. Change up your hairstyle for a fashionable change of pace!

You can change your hairstyle at any time from inside your room.
The purchase of Monster Hunter World: Iceborne is required to use this add-on.
